posts.postText:
Offender name?:DukeWithZeNuke
Which Server?:TTT
Offender's Steam ID?:STEAM_0:0:37766021
What the Offender did?:On Duke's Traitor round 02 killed him for using the healthstation, which 02 explained both in that round and after the round. Then the next round Duke revenge RDM'd 02, and when I asked him why, he said "My finer slipped". It wasn't even a one shot kill, obviously not a misfire, just him going up to him and starting to light him up.
Admins on?:Nope.
Proof?:
